statements: SELECT vulnerability_name, severity_level FROM vulnerability_info
SELECT * FROM vulnerability_info WHERE severity_level = 'high'
SELECT vulnerability_id, vulnerability_name FROM vulnerability_info WHERE patch_priority = 'medium' AND patch_deadline > CURDATE()
SELECT affected_software FROM vulnerability_info WHERE vulnerability_id = 3
SELECT * FROM vulnerability_info ORDER BY patch_deadline DESC
SELECT * FROM vulnerability_info WHERE severity_level = 'high';
SELECT vulnerability_name, severity_level FROM vulnerability_info WHERE patch_priority = 'high';
SELECT vulnerability_id, vulnerability_name, patch_priority FROM vulnerability_info WHERE patch_deadline < '2023-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT severity_level FROM vulnerability_info;
SELECT * FROM vulnerability_info ORDER BY patch_priority DESC, vulnerability_name ASC;
SELECT vulnerability_id, vulnerability_name, severity_level FROM vulnerability_info WHERE severity_level = 'High';
SELECT * FROM vulnerability_info ORDER BY vulnerability_id DESC;
SELECT vulnerability_name, COUNT(*) AS total FROM vulnerability_info GROUP BY vulnerability_name;
SELECT vulnerability_name, mitigation_description FROM vulnerability_info JOIN mitigation_efforts ON vulnerability_info.vulnerability_id = mitigation_efforts.vulnerability_id;
SELECT vulnerability_name, description FROM vulnerability_info WHERE affected_systems ->> 'os' = 'Windows';
SELECT vulnerability_id, vulnerability_name, severity_level FROM vulnerability_info WHERE severity_level='High';
SELECT * FROM vulnerability_info INNER JOIN mitigation_efforts ON vulnerability_info.vulnerability_id = mitigation_efforts.vulnerability_id WHERE mitigation_status='Implemented';
SELECT vulnerability_id, vulnerability_name, description FROM vulnerability_info WHERE severity_level='Low' ORDER BY vulnerability_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_vulnerabilities, severity_level FROM vulnerability_info GROUP BY severity_level ORDER BY total_vulnerabilities DESC;

SELECT mitigation_id, vulnerability_id, mitigation_description, mitigation_status FROM mitigation_efforts WHERE vulnerability_id IN (SELECT vulnerability_id FROM vulnerability_info WHERE severity_level='Critical');
SELECT * FROM Vulnerabilities;
SELECT vulnerability_name, severity_level, affected_system FROM Vulnerabilities WHERE severity_level='high';
SELECT vulnerability_name, affected_software_version FROM Vulnerabilities WHERE affected_software_version IS NOT NULL;
SELECT strategy_name, recommended_action FROM Mitigation_Strategies;
SELECT vulnerability_name, affected_system, affected_assets FROM Vulnerabilities JOIN Vulnerability_Impact ON Vulnerabilities.vulnerability_id = Vulnerability_Impact.vulnerability_id;
SELECT * FROM Vulnerabilities WHERE severity_level = 'high';
SELECT vulnerability_name, affected_system FROM Vulnerabilities WHERE patch_available = TRUE;
SELECT vulnerability_name, severity_level FROM Vulnerabilities ORDER BY severity_level DESC;

SELECT v.vulnerability_name, m.strategy_name FROM Vulnerabilities v JOIN Vulnerability_Impact vi ON v.vulnerability_id = vi.vulnerability_id JOIN Mitigation_Strategies m ON vi.strategy_id = m.strategy_id;

SELECT v.vulnerability_name, COUNT(vi.strategy_id) AS number_of_strategies FROM Vulnerabilities v LEFT JOIN Vulnerability_Impact vi ON v.vulnerability_id = vi.vulnerability_id GROUP BY v.vulnerability_name HAVING COUNT(vi.strategy_id) >= 2;
SELECT * FROM vulnerability_info WHERE severity_level > 2;
SELECT vulnerability_name, vulnerability_type FROM vulnerability_info WHERE vulnerability_type = 'Server';
SELECT DISTINCT vulnerability_name FROM vulnerability_info ORDER BY vulnerability_name ASC;
SELECT vulnerability_name, severity_level FROM vulnerability_info ORDER BY severity_level DESC;
SELECT patch_description, patch_date FROM patching_efforts WHERE success_rate > 90;
SELECT vulnerability_name, severity_level FROM vulnerability_info WHERE severity_level > 5;
SELECT * FROM mitigation_strategy WHERE prioritization_level = 3 ORDER BY strategy_id DESC;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM affected_assets WHERE vulnerability_id = 10 AND strategy_id = 5;
SELECT patch_description, patch_date FROM patching_efforts WHERE success_rate > 90 ORDER BY patch_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM vulnerability_info AS v INNER JOIN affected_assets AS a ON v.vulnerability_id = a.vulnerability_id WHERE v.severity_level >= 8 AND a.asset_type = 'Network';
SELECT patch_name, patch_date FROM PatchManagement ORDER BY patch_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM MitigationPlans WHERE mitigation_status = 'Implemented';
SELECT system_name, system_type FROM VulnerableSystems WHERE system_type = 'Server';
SELECT mitigation_name, mitigation_description FROM MitigationPlans ORDER BY mitigation_id ASC;
SELECT scan_date, results FROM VulnerabilityScans WHERE scan_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT patch_name, patch_date FROM PatchManagement WHERE patch_applied = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM MitigationPlans WHERE mitigation_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY mitigation_id DESC;
SELECT system_name, system_type, last_scan_date FROM VulnerableSystems WHERE system_type = 'Server' ORDER BY last_scan_date DESC;
SELECT scan_date, results FROM VulnerabilityScans WHERE scan_date >= '2021-10-01';
SELECT patch_name, patch_date, patch_applied FROM PatchManagement JOIN VulnerabilityScans ON patch_date = scan_date AND patch_applied = TRUE ORDER BY patch_date DESC;
